doc.title: Chefs of Cucina Amore
doc.plot: The new 26-episode series, Chefs of Cucina Amore, combines the talents of movie star and cookbook author, Vincent Schiavelli, with four of the nation's most illustrious teachers of Italian cooking. Together this unique team demonstrates food specialties and traditions from all over Italy. Viewers can enjoy the recipes uncovered during decades of Italian exploration by Faith Willinger, Nancy Harmon Jenkins, Joe Simone and Nick Malgieri. Warm, personal stories from Vincent Schiavelli's childhood as an Italian immigrant in Brooklyn, New York, round out each delicious show with a laugh and a tear.
